name: celebration
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B1 [ C ] a special social event, such as a party, when you celebrate something: There were lively New Year celebrations all over town. Such good news calls for (= deserves) a celebration!
[ U ] the act of celebrating something: Let's buy some champagne in celebration of her safe arrival.
More examplesFewer examplesIf ever there was a cause for celebration, this peace treaty was it.They planned a special celebration for her homecoming.A celebration is held for the boy at the age when he is considered to have reached manhood.The ending of the war is not a cause for celebration, but rather for regret that it ever happened.This calls for a celebration!
